product_name: Ibex Giro Montana Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Ibex Giro Montana bike jersey helps you stay comfortable with all-natural wool and thoughtful features like a 12 in. front zipper and a single rear pocket. Made of soft, nonirritating 18.5-micron merino wool, this top insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Back zippered pocket holds your snacks and small bike tools. Ibex Giro Montana bike jersey has a semifitted cut; machine washable. Wool meets Zque(TM) standards, ensuring environmental, social and economic sustainability, as well as animal welfare and traceability back to the source. Closeout.
short_description: The Ibex Giro Montana bike jersey helps you stay comfortable with all-natural wool and thoughtful features like a 12 in. front zipper and a single rear pocket.
